about_the_game:
Canvas Legacy is a sandbox MMORPG with a fully player-driven economy, featuring open-world housing where all shops are run by players. Explore dungeons, fight bosses, participate in Kingdom wars and even become King yourself. Or just build your dream house and paint nice things.

Kingdoms

The world of Canvas Legacy is divided between two kingdoms. Each kingdom is ruled by a player monarch, who can set taxes and exercise the crown's sovereign rights.



A group of adventurers visiting the court to hold an audience with the King.

Open-world housing

Location, location, location. Any player can claim a plot anywhere on the map and build a house. Do you want to open a shop, become a farmer or breed pets? It's up to you.

Paint pixel art

By mixing mats into colors you can use your brush to paint the world. Awesome pixel art, graffiti or just advertising your shop. Anything goes; the world is your Canvas.



Community showcase.

Dungeons and bosses

You know the drill. Kill monsters, get loot, level up your character and raid dungeons. Currently featuring four classes: warrior, mage, ranger and tamer.

Wars

The two kingdoms are in constant war. By pledging allegiance to the King, players can join the war and push the front to expand their kingdom's border (and thus increase tax revenues).

Player islands

You want to build a massive mega structure or paint a large piece of pixel art but can't afford a plot that big? No problem, player islands are instanced for that purpose but can't be used for farming or stables.

Mining and fishing

Of course. Mine through mountains to find ore veins or fish the shores to find that special fishing spot.

End game

  • Fight for the throne and become King
  • Build factories with gnomes handling the supply lines (think a certain factory game but gnomes instead of conveyor belts)
  • "Just one more run" roguelike dungeon with ephemeral power-ups
  • Explore a separate procedurally generated hack'n'slash world with its own loot system

And much more...

Join the Discord and participate in the alpha for free today!
